definitions.definition: The fruit of the Punica granatum , about the size of an orange with a thick , hard , reddish skin enclosing many seeds , each with an edible pink or red pulp tasting both sweet and tart .
The shrub or small tree that bears the fruit.
A dark red or orange-red colour , like that of the pulp or skin of a pomegranate fruit.
A person of British descent , especially one who has ( recently ) immigrated to Australia ; a pom , a pommy .

main_definition: The fruit of the Punica granatum , about the size of an orange with a thick , hard , reddish skin enclosing many seeds , each with an edible pink or red pulp tasting both sweet and tart .
secondary_definitions: The shrub or small tree that bears the fruit.
A dark red or orange-red colour , like that of the pulp or skin of a pomegranate fruit.
( Australia , colloquial , derogatory , obsolete ) A person of British descent , especially one who has ( recently ) immigrated to Australia ; a pom , a pommy .
